^breadcrumb#.markdownDescription:
https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-developer-docs/docs/vtex-breadcrumb

The VTEX BreadCrumb is a navigation scheme that shows a user's browsing history up to their current location in your store.

`"vtex.breadcrumb@1.x"`

showOnMobile.description: It determines whether Breadcrumb should also be displayed on mobile

homeIconSize.description: Controls the size property of IconHome

caretIconSize.description: Controls the size property of IconCaret
